languages.text: {n}Бросив напоследок полный ненависти взгляд, мутант спешит убраться. Уходя, он шипит сквозь зубы настолько знакомые бранные словечки, что на мгновение вам кажется, будто вы — дома, в Просторе Коронус.{/n}

{n}The mutant fixes you with a look of hatred and scurries away. As he leaves, you hear him hiss a torrent of familiar profanities that almost makes you feel as though you are back home in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив напоследок полный ненависти взгляд, мутант спешит убраться. Уходя, он шипит сквозь зубы настолько знакомые бранные словечки, что на мгновение вам кажется, будто вы — дома, в Просторе Коронус.{/n}

traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}変異体は憎悪の眼差しでこちらを見つめ、そそくさと立ち去った。その時、おなじみの冒涜的な言葉を連発するのが聞こえ、まるでコロヌス・エクスパンスに戻ったような気分になる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant fixes you with a look of hatred and scurries away. As he leaves, you hear him hiss a torrent of familiar profanities that almost makes you feel as though you are back home in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体は憎悪の眼差しでこちらを見つめ、そそくさと立ち去った。その時、おなじみの冒涜的な言葉を連発するのが聞こえ、まるでコロヌス・エクスパンスに戻ったような気分になる。{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}变种人用充满憎恨的目光盯着你，之后匆匆离开了。当他离开时，你听到他嘶嘶地说出一连串你非常熟悉的脏话，几乎让你感觉仿佛回到了科罗努斯扩区。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant fixes you with a look of hatred and scurries away. As he leaves, you hear him hiss a torrent of familiar profanities that almost makes you feel as though you are back home in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}变种人用充满憎恨的目光盯着你，之后匆匆离开了。当他离开时，你听到他嘶嘶地说出一连串你非常熟悉的脏话，几乎让你感觉仿佛回到了科罗努斯扩区。{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El mutante te lanza una mirada de odio y se aleja corriendo. Mientras se marcha, le oyes sisear un torrente de blasfemias que te hacen sentir como si estuvieras de vuelta en casa, en la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant fixes you with a look of hatred and scurries away. As he leaves, you hear him hiss a torrent of familiar profanities that almost makes you feel as though you are back home in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante te lanza una mirada de odio y se aleja corriendo. Mientras se marcha, le oyes sisear un torrente de blasfemias que te hacen sentir como si estuvieras de vuelta en casa, en la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant wirft dir einen hasserfüllten Blick zu und huscht davon. Während er geht, stößt er einen Schwall vertrauter Schimpfwörter aus, die dir fast das Gefühl geben, wieder zu Hause in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant fixes you with a look of hatred and scurries away. As he leaves, you hear him hiss a torrent of familiar profanities that almost makes you feel as though you are back home in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mutant wirft dir einen hasserfüllten Blick zu und huscht davon. Während er geht, hörst du ihn einen Schwall vertrauter Schimpfwörter ausspucken, bei denen du fast das Gefühl hast, wieder zu Hause in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu sein.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Le mutant vous lance un regard plein de haine avant de détaler en proférant un chapelet de jurons qui vous sont familiers et vous donnent l'impression d'être de retour chez vous, dans les Étendues de Koronus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant fixes you with a look of hatred and scurries away. As he leaves, you hear him hiss a torrent of familiar profanities that almost makes you feel as though you are back home in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant vous lance un regard plein de haine avant de détaler en proférant un chapelet de jurons qui vous sont familiers et vous donnent l'impression d'être de retour chez vous, dans les étendues de Koronus.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Mutant, sana nefret dolu bir bakış atıp ortadan kayboluyor. Giderken sanki Koronus Enginliği'ndeymişsin gibi hissettiren, tanıdık bir dizi küfür kustuğunu duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant fixes you with a look of hatred and scurries away. As he leaves, you hear him hiss a torrent of familiar profanities that almost makes you feel as though you are back home in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant, sana nefret dolu bir bakış atıp ortadan kayboluyor. Giderken sanki Koronus Enginliği'ndeymiş gibi hissettiren tanıdık bir küfür dalgasıyla fısıldandığını duyuyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain
